definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: III. [[עמר]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. 9amara, 9amira live, live long; also worship; n. pr. 9umarun etc.; RS:K 266 prop. mng. worshipper, [[עָמְרִי]] worshipper of ´[[י]] (cf. We:Skizzen iii. 165) against him Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 185, who cp. meaning live, 9umrun, 9amrun life).
